explains: adj. 节能的，节约能源的；高能效的

sentences.en: With some exceptions, the oldest homes tend to be the least energy-efficient.
sentences.cn: 除了一些例外，最古老的房屋往往是最不节能的。

sentences.en: Priscilla Ouchida's "energy-efficient" house turned out to be a horrible dream.
sentences.cn: 普莉希拉·欧奇达的“节能”房子变成了一场可怕的梦。

sentences.en: Dug into a mountainside, the hockey arena is well concealed and energy-efficient.
sentences.cn: 冰球场建在山坡上，隐蔽得很好，而且节能。
